bcbioSingleCell
  • Reference
  • News

Counts Accessor

Counts Accessor

# S4 method for bcbioSingleCell
counts(object, gene2symbol = FALSE,
  as = "dgCMatrix")

# S4 method for seurat
counts(object, normalized = FALSE)

Arguments

object

Object.
gene2symbol

Convert Ensembl gene identifiers (rownames) to gene symbols. Recommended for passing counts to Seurat.
as

Return class (recommended; dgCMatrix, dgTMatrix) or dense matrix (matrix).
normalized

Normalized (TRUE) or raw (FALSE) counts.

Value

Matrix class object, depending on as argument.

Examples

load(system.file(
    file.path("extdata", "bcb.rda"),
    package = "bcbioSingleCell"))
load(system.file(
    file.path("extdata", "seurat.rda"),
    package = "bcbioSingleCell"))

# bcbioSingleCell
counts(bcb, gene2symbol = FALSE) %>% glimpse()
#> Formal class 'dgCMatrix' [package "Matrix"] with 6 slots
#>   ..@ i       : int [1:4573015] 0 3 10 11 16 18 19 21 23 24 ...
#>   ..@ p       : int [1:18241] 0 3223 7453 11599 14777 18668 22943 26859 29857 33608 ...
#>   ..@ Dim     : int [1:2] 39297 18240
#>   ..@ Dimnames:List of 2
#>   .. ..$ : chr [1:39297] "ENSG00000000003" "ENSG00000000005" "ENSG00000000419" "ENSG00000000457" ...
#>   .. ..$ : chr [1:18240] "run1_AGAGGATA_CCGATACG_CAAGAGGG" "run1_AGAGGATA_TGCTTCAT_GCAGGGTA" "run1_AGAGGATA_GGTTGAGA_GAGAGTAT" "run1_AGAGGATA_TCAGCCTC_TGCAAGGG" ...
#>   ..@ x       : num [1:4573015] 2 9 3 1 4 2 2 2 6 2 ...
#>   ..@ factors : list()
counts(bcb, gene2symbol = TRUE) %>% glimpse()
#> Formal class 'dgCMatrix' [package "Matrix"] with 6 slots
#>   ..@ i       : int [1:4573015] 0 3 10 11 16 18 19 21 23 24 ...
#>   ..@ p       : int [1:18241] 0 3223 7453 11599 14777 18668 22943 26859 29857 33608 ...
#>   ..@ Dim     : int [1:2] 39297 18240
#>   ..@ Dimnames:List of 2
#>   .. ..$ : Named chr [1:39297] "TSPAN6" "TNMD" "DPM1" "SCYL3" ...
#>   .. .. ..- attr(*, "names")= chr [1:39297] "ENSG00000000003" "ENSG00000000005" "ENSG00000000419" "ENSG00000000457" ...
#>   .. ..$ : chr [1:18240] "run1_AGAGGATA_CCGATACG_CAAGAGGG" "run1_AGAGGATA_TGCTTCAT_GCAGGGTA" "run1_AGAGGATA_GGTTGAGA_GAGAGTAT" "run1_AGAGGATA_TCAGCCTC_TGCAAGGG" ...
#>   ..@ x       : num [1:4573015] 2 9 3 1 4 2 2 2 6 2 ...
#>   ..@ factors : list()

#>   .. ..$ : Named chr [1:18893] "TSPAN6" "TNMD" "DPM1" "SCYL3" ...
#>   .. .. ..- attr(*, "names")= chr [1:18893] "ENSG00000000003" "ENSG00000000005" "ENSG00000000419" "ENSG00000000457" ...
#>   .. ..$ : chr [1:591] "M1_AAACACGG_GTGGAGCT" "M1_AAACACTA_ATCCCACG" "M1_AAACACTA_CTTAGGTA" "M1_AAACACTA_CTTCGATT" ...
#>   ..@ x       : num [1:950015] 1 1 1 2 2 1 3 4 2 2 ...
